description: Try our easy to follow Baked Custard Apple Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Custard Apple Crumble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Lightly grease a 6-cup ovenproof dish.
Break open the custard apples and, using a spoon, scoop out the flesh and discard seeds. Combine with canned apple and dates and transfer to prepared dish.

Mix flour, oats, hazelnuts, sugar and cinnamon in a bowl. Coarsely grate butter over mixture. Rub butter through the dry mixture until crumble. Sprinkle crumble topping over fruit. Bake for 30 minutes until the topping is golden. Serve with warm custard or ice-cream.
